text: Will there ever be a "File Manager" Column type similar to the Image column where you can choose additional items from the file manager like zip files?
I can put up an issue to add this in.
What would be an example use case?
building a brand image asset gallery where an end user can browse the artwork then download a zip of a jpg, eps, ai file
Building dynamic venue pages for an event planner.  Would like to be able to link directly to a floor plan file.
^ same for real estate, plats, traffic plans, etc...
Sent you a screenshot of what I am working on. Right now i have a URL column but that would require the user to go to the file manager, copy the url from there and then add it into that hubdb field
so its really one less step
